title: Lakshmi Vanki - Divine Bangle with Gemstone Mandala
materials: 22K Gold (Suddha Bangaram). Adorned with meticulously set Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (Vajralu)
a central Emerald (Pachcha) and Coral (Pagadam). Features a Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This Vanki Kada features a striking mandala design, incorporating traditional South Indian floral motifs and intricate filigree work. The center boasts a lush green emerald, surrounded by a halo of rich red rubies and sparkling diamonds. The addition of coral beads on the sides adds a touch of auspiciousness. The lattice structure offers a contemporary twist to a classic design. The bangle incorporates a secure clasp for ease of wear and removal.
colors: Dominant gold hue with contrasting red of the rubies and coral
the vibrant green of the emerald
and the dazzling white of the diamonds. A traditional and auspicious color combination.
occasions: and traditional South Indian ceremonies. It's a stunning piece for the bride's trousseau (pellikuturu)
especially for the muhurtham ceremony. Also perfect for modern celebratory events.
description: A timeless piece that blends tradition with contemporary design. The use of high-quality gemstones and meticulous craftsmanship ensures both lasting beauty and enduring value. The mandala design symbolizes completeness and unity, making it a powerful and meaningful gift. The Vanki Kada is a representation of Goddess Lakshmi and hence the piece is not only beautiful but also auspicious.
